name: DragonKing

attributes.name: Ownable

attributes.documentation:
@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.

attributes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.

attributes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.

attributes.documentation:
@title Destructible
@dev Base contract that can be destroyed by owner. All funds in contract will be sent to the owner.
attributes.name: Destructible

attributes.documentation: @dev Transfers the current balance to the owner and terminates the contract.

leave the game.
pays out the sender's balance and removes him and his characters from the game

replaceCharacter

attributes.documentation:
The volcano eruption can be triggered by anybody but only if enough time has passed since the last eription.
The volcano hits up to a certain percentage of characters, but at least one.
The percantage is specified in 'percentageToKill'
attributes.name: triggerVolcanoEruption

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "not enough time passed since last eruption"

attributes.type: literal_string "not enough time passed since last eruption"
attributes.value: not enough time passed since last eruption

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "there are no characters in the game"

attributes.type: literal_string "there are no characters in the game"
attributes.value: there are no characters in the game

attributes.documentation:
Knight can attack a dragon.
Archer can attack only a balloon.
Dragon can attack wizards and archers.
Wizard can attack anyone, except balloon.
Balloon cannot attack.
The value of the loser is transfered to the winner.
@param characterID the ID of the knight to perfrom the attack
@param characterIndex the index of the knight in the ids-array. Just needed to save gas costs.
           In case it's unknown or incorrect, the index is looked up in the array.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "not enough time passed since the last fight of this character"

attributes.value: not enough time passed since the last fight of this character

attributes.value: only owner can initiate a fight for this character

attributes.documentation:
distributes the given amount among the surviving characters
@param totalAmount nthe amount to distribute
attributes.name: distribute

attributes.documentation:
allows the owner to collect the accumulated fees
sends the given amount to the owner's address if the amount does not exceed the
fees (cannot touch the players' balances) minus 100 finney (ensure that oraclize fees can be paid)
@param amount the amount to be collected
attributes.name: collectFees

attributes.documentation: pays out the players and kills the game.
